评论概述: Wonderful shoe but with manufacturing defect
类型: Size: 11 WideColor: W81 V2 | Black Gum (Canvas)
评论详情: I want to give these shoes five stars. They are stylish, comfortable, versatile, and inexpensive. However, mine came with a visually small (but functionally significant) manufacturing defect. The front-right-most shoelace hole has an incomplete filling. As a result, after only a few days of wearing them, the shoelace is shredding to pieces on the sharp metal interior of the hole, and I have to be extremely careful whenever lacing them up.  If a return or refund is possible, I will absolutely raise my rating. However, given the circumstances, I don't feel that I can fairly give the product any more than two stars.

类型: Size: 10 WideColor: W81 V2 | Wine Red (Canvas)
评论详情: Eve n though these are mens shoes, I bought for my sister. My sister has a lot of serious foot problems that can only be solved by breaking all the bones and rebuilding her feet, and since that is not really an option, we try shoes to help her every few months. I told her barefoot shoes with the super wide toe box and zero drop maybe be an option but it seemed so counterintuitive since her feet hurt and you would think lots of padding is a cure. So I figured it was worth a shot. She put them on to wear around the house and told me the next day all my pain is gone, but it seems this weird shape will cause more problems in the long run. Well her pessimism was proved wrong. She has never been happier with a shoe. I have bought her every color. We get the mens because mens shoes tend to run a little wider anyway and she really does love them.

评论详情: I've had these for 7 months. For the price, it's a good buy. I work retail and have worn these daily since I bought them. There's plenty of room for the toes. It's pretty comfortable to wear, as it is lined with what seems like very thin foam, and there's extra padding on the back of the ankle. The outsole is very thin, so you'll feel a lot of what you step on. It also has pretty good grip on dry surfaces. I primarily used them on smooth concrete or light trails and there's still plenty of life in the soles.  The shoe is very flexible, which is good for kneeling tasks. A problem, however, is that the upper has split from the outsole where the toes bend, but that's to be expected for the price.

类型: Size: 10 WideColor: W81 V2 | Black Gum (Canvas)
评论详情: I love these wide toe-box, "barefoot" shoes from Whitin; this is the 3rd pair I've purchased, and I rarely wear any other shoe.  The quality is decent for the price. I usually get about 9 months of use before the tread goes bald and the insert comes unglued. This is a great length of time for a product of this price, especially considering I wear them as my primary shoe nearly every day for 12+ hours.  If you've never used "barefoot" shoes before, it can take a week or two to get used to walking on the balls of your feet instead of your heels, and feeling more texture in the surfaces you walk upon. But this is good for the health of your feet, so I suggest keeping it up until they feel natural.  My only real complaint about is the tread can be slick on wet surfaces. It'd be nice if the tread was a tad deeper or had slightly wider grooves. But I realize there is only so much that can be done with a sole as thin and flexible as these, and it's only mildly more slippery than the sole of standard sneakers. But it's enough of an issue that I actively avoid wearing them on wet decks or sport courts.  You should definitely give these shoes a try if you have any interest in barefoot shoes, or just an economical, comfortable all-around footwear solution. I doubt I'll ever go back to standard shoes again. Very happy customer!

类型: Size: 10 WideColor: W81 V2 | Brown Grey (Canvas)
评论详情: I normally wear a 10.5 4E shoe and have been hard pressed to find something reasonably priced that size.  The normal "wide" shoes from the name brands tend to pinch mid sole or in the toe box.  If you look at this shoe, it's got a wide toe box.  I bought the size 11 and was skeptical when the shoe came shrink wrapped.  But... the shoes fit great.  It really is a zero drop sole and gives you a barefoot feel.  I don't walk many miles in these shoes and would probably put on shoes with thicker soles if I did.  They are tailor made for the terrain between your cube and the break room are go quite nice with my jeans or even shorts.I think at this price, you can get a few pairs of different color for whatever suits your mood.  If I had a gripe, this shoe is not for the lazy person who just wants to slip on their shoes.  I break out the shoe horn or untie/tie the laces them to put them on.

These dont have a suede texture to the surface. Instead it's spray painted to look like suede from a distance. I'm disappointed the Amazon listing didn't make that clear but overall the shoes do fit great and are comfortable to wear. The soles are super grippy too.

评论概述: Perfect fit, excellent grip, my new favorites until the rains come
类型: Size: 10 WideColor: W81 V2 | All Black (Canvas)
评论详情: I was pleasantly surprised by these. They fit like a glove, and are my ideal balance between something to protect the bottom of my feet but not inhibit foot and toe movement and ground contact.  I use them as daily drivers, but they would make good shoes for lifting or movement workouts and have used them a little for both.  They grip extremely well, in loose soil, smooth floors, wet concrete, and everywhere else I've gone with them.  They tie up ok (a little wrinkly towards the toebox), and seem durable with no separations at the glued seams, or things pulling out of the canvas.  I'm somewhere between 50 and 100 miles into them, including a bit of running, calisthenics, and a trail walk, but mostly just getting around town and travelling. They've done well in all of these, though I noted that they performed least well on the trail, where they are a bit too stiff but also lack sufficient tread for uneven/natural terrain (the slightly harder sole makes it difficult to wrap your toes/feet around rocks and roots like a more barefoot style would let you, but they lack sufficient tread to grip rock and root like a proper hiking shoe/boot.)  I was pleasantly surprised with how grippy the soles are. I've walked across a marble floor on rainy days that I've known to be slippery and found the traction to be extreme (like new gummy soles). And yet, they gave minimal chirping and no squeaking, unlike most grippy shoes. It was comparable to a good pair of basketball shoes.  Their biggest problem so far is that they don't clean up well. Having gotten some mud on them, I found that a couple of attempts at hand washing with soapy water was insufficient. They are still faintly dingy now, a subtle difference from their initial pure black look. I've now sprayed them with a waterproofing coat, which should help reduce how heavily it stains in the future (and also give slight protection for puddle season, though I still wouldn't trust them to keep your feet dry in a proper rain.)  I purchased these perceiving them as budget barefoots, but think they hold up to the high dollar contenders. Pleasantly surprised and am ordering another pair. They've served well and I'd be surprised if they failed before 2025, but wouldn't feel put out if they did.

类型: Size: 8.5 WideColor: W81 V2 | Black Gum (Canvas)
评论详情: I had recently listened to a talk about the benefits of letting children go barefoot and ended up (re)discovering barefoot shoes for adults. I looked into it a little bit and thought it was worth a try. I’ve always enjoyed going barefoot when I can, so I was hopeful the transition wouldn’t be too hard on my body.  I’ve been wearing these shoes for about two months and my initial impression was that it feels like I’m walking barefoot. By that I mean the way I stand and move is exactly like it is when I’m shoeless. Obviously, ground-feel is different from barefoot but it is closer to actually being barefoot than it is to wearing conventional shoes. I feel like this should not have surprised me but I’ve never experienced shoes like this before.  Fit and finish seem good, but not perfect, overall and they seem hearty enough. Two months in, there is no wear to speak of.  I walked two miles yesterday and today is the first time I’ve noticed any pain or muscle tightness from wearing these shoes.  Still very happy with them.

类型: Size: 9.5 WideColor: W81 V2 | Beige Gum (Canvas)
评论详情: FYI: I bought the cream colored version.  Good looking fabric uppers with gum rubber heel-less sole.  Good footbed liner.  Washable!!!  And foot-shaped for real feet!  Very comfortable, and excellent traction.  Squeak a bit on hard surfaces (not a big deal).  Last but not least, $40 . . . heck of a bargain!

类型: Size: 8.5 WideColor: W81 V2 | Black Gum (Canvas)
评论详情: First of all, yes, I did buy the men's sneaker. I think they're cuter than the women's similar style. I usually buy a women's 10-10.5, and the 42 fits perfectly! I'm barefoot 95% of the time. I walk out in the snow to put out the trash in the winter just because I hate shoes and socks so much. I wear flip-flops, UGGs and Crocs. That's it.. no socks because I absolutely hate the feel of them. These are my so comfy and cute! It reminds me of when I was a kid and wore Keds everywhere. They so flexible! I'll definitely be ordering more of different colors!

类型: Size: 12 WideColor: W81 V2 | Beige Gum (Canvas)
评论详情: Great barefoot option. Great price. Great fit. Fairly durable. Bought these and don’t feel guilty really wearing them down. Definitely going to get another pair.  Size 12

类型: Size: 9.5 WideColor: W81 V2 | All Black (Canvas)
评论详情: I was thoroughly impressed with this shoe. It’s simple, minimal, but doesn’t sacrifice comfort or style. My feet are always cramped for work. It’s nice to slide into shoes that wear so well. Wide toes allow ample room for spread and the barefoot, 0 drop feel is so natural. Great for a night out, walking around the town, or at home. Good quality too. I see some people on here nit picking on them but I have zero issues. Highly recommend.

评论概述: Almost as good as vivobarefoot at 1/5 the price
类型: Size: 8 WideColor: W81 V2 | All Black (Canvas)
评论详情: The are awesome. Enough said

评论概述: Amazing comfortable inexpensive well made shoes.
类型: Size: 8 WideColor: W81 V2 | All Black (Canvas)
评论详情: All describing words I used in the title apply. These shoes are amazing. I took them to Red Rock in the Mojave and they held up with no problem (or scuffing, even!) to my cuckoo self clambering over rocks and jumping off of boulders. Quick dust busting (I used compressed air but you could definitely use a dust feather or small vacuum) later and they were very much the original black color. Grip is amazing (and pleasantly squeaky on the concrete floors at Home Depot). Fit is like a sock.  *Important* The thin insoles they come with really really really help the adjustment period from full cushion to zero drop cushionlessness. I kept mine in and my feet feel so much stronger already.  Highly recommend a waterproofing spray but I just took a plain paraffin wax candle and rubbed it all over the upper. After the whole upper was sufficiently waxed (removing the laces really helps!), the color was white from the wax. I took a hair dryer, turned it on high heat, and warmed the shoes with it. The wax melted and it's a very solid natural long lasting waterproofing finish.  Highly recommend these.  Update:  One little thing I really don't like is they're not as wide as I would like barefoot shoes to be. My feet are supposed to have more room to spread out but the shoes are 'normal' width. Keep this in mind.  No other problems.

类型: Size: 9.5 WideColor: W81 V2 | Brown Grey (Canvas)
评论详情: So glad that I tried these shoes. Never wore these kind of "minimalist" shoes before. Now I wear them everywhere. I was developing bunions and my feet hurt all the time. These are definitely helping to straighten out my toes! They are also the perfect gym shoes. Just ordered another pair for casual dress.

类型: Size: 10 WideColor: W81 V2 | All Black (Canvas)
评论详情: they look great and feel amazing. so much toe room! I can't believe I wore 'normal' shoes for 33 years without noticing how badly it affected my feet. have only worn them for a half a day but loved every minute of it.

类型: Size: 13 WideColor: W81 V2 | Brown Grey (Canvas)
评论详情: I hate wearing shoes period and these feel like I have nothing on. They are light and comfortable, they were a little tight at first but loosened up after my first wear. Thinking about ordering a second pair.

类型: Size: 14 WideColor: W81 V2 | Black Gum (Canvas)
评论详情: Les souliers sont parfait. Pour des premiers souliers pied nu je suis entièrement satisfait. Mes pieds ont de l'espace, je ne me sens aucunement coincé. Le tissus est solide et facile à nettoyer. Il ne sont pas trop rigide, comme des souliers normaux. Parfait pour des marches, mais pas pour des randonnés en montagne.

类型: Size: 8.5 WideColor: W81 V2 | Wine Red (Canvas)
评论详情: Very comfortable shoes, I'm loving them so far.

类型: Size: 8.5 WideColor: W81 V2 | Black Gum (Canvas)
评论详情: This is my first pair of barefoot shoes and I absolutely love them! Ever since I started wearing them, I no longer experience any pain in my feet nor shins. However, you'll need to "re-learn" how to walk in them. It's best if you take a few minutes read up on or watch a demonstration video on transitioning to barefoot shoes.  Also, I highly suggest using them with toe socks and toe spacers for the ultimate barefoot shoe walking experience! :)  Lastly, they're not waterproof nor water resistant. So, be sure to use some sort of water repellant spray with them.

类型: Size: 8 WideColor: W81 V2 | Black Gum (Canvas)
评论详情: Me gustaron mucho y de muy buena calidad por desgracia no fueron de número, ordenare otro par.

类型: Size: 7 WideColor: W81 V2 | Black Gum (Canvas)
评论详情: Son anchos y cómodos para mis dedos, util para cualquier tipo de camino. Suela muy suave. Lo único que no me agrada es que por su material es un zapato que huele mal  y hace que huela mal tu pie. Lo solucione con talco para zapatos.
